text: The 1998 Navy Midshipmen football team represented the United States Naval Academy (USNA) during the 1998 NCAA Division I-A football season. Navy competed as an independent with no conference affiliation. The team was led by fourth-year head coach Charlie Weatherbie. ==Schedule== ==Personnel== ==References== Navy Midshipmen Category:Navy Midshipmen football seasons Category:1998 in sports in Maryland
title: 1998 Navy Midshipmen football team
